text: Flavorful Origins is a twenty-part Mandarin-language television documentary series, exploring culinary secrets of China and the various cooking techniques and cuisines with native Asian ingredients from the Chaoshan (season 1) and Yunnan (season 2) regions. ==Release== It was released on February 11, 2019 on Netflix streaming. Season 2 of Flavorful Origins is due to release on Netflix on October 30, 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2010s documentary television series Category:Mandarin-language television shows
title: Flavorful Origins
